text: visvasa kota yahakam kalavun, evata pahalin gamga gala basna (svarga) uyan valata niyata vasayenma allah Ã¦tulat karayi. tavada pratiksepa kalavun vana ovuhu (danduvama) bhukti vinditi. tavada (molova bhukti vindinnan) govipala satun anubhava karannak men anubhava karati. tavada (nira) ginna ovunata himi navatÃ¦nayi
